channel.title: Regression on Data Science Studio
channel.description: Recent content in Regression on Data Science Studio

item.title: Manifold Regression (part 2)
item.description: Welcome to the world of manifold regression! In part 2 we will apply manifold regression to a case study involving fMRI brain imaging data using R and MGLMRiem. See part 1 for an introduction to these models. Read full post

item.title: Manifold Regression (part 1)
item.description: Welcome to the world of manifold regression! In part 1 we will introduce the basic concepts, overview the theory behind regression on manifolds, develop an intuition for these models, and discuss their applications. Read full post
